summary: Documentary about the Funk Brothers, a group of Detroit musicians who backed up dozens of Motown artists.
cast: Richard 'Pistol' Allen|Jack Ashford|Bob Babbitt|Benny 'Papa Zita' Benjamin|Eddie 'Bongo' Brown|Bootsy Collins|Johnny Griffith|Ben Harper|Joe Hunter|James Jamerson|Uriel Jones|Montell Jordan|Chaka Khan|Gerald Levert|Joe Messina|Meshell Ndegeocello|Joan Osborne|Rudy Robinson|Tom Scott|Earl Van Dyke|Robert White|Eddie Willis|Brian Marable|Andre Braugher|Paul Riser|Steve Jordan|Eddie Holland|Don Was|Otis Williams|Martha Reeves|James Jamerson Jr.|Brian Holland|Lottie Claiborne|Jay Butler|Alan Slutsky|Dennis Coffey|Nathan Watts|Ralphe Armstrong|Penny Jamerson|Alex Alexander|Donald Becks Jr.|Gary Bosek|Michael Ellison|Otis Lockhart|Antoine McKay|Mark Mutafian|Antonio Ramirez|Kevin Smith|Lynch R. Travis|Thomas Michael Ventimiglio|Joe Wheeler|Paul Burt|Lamont Witcher|Aubree Gaston|Deseray Teague|Tyler Blakely|William Stockdale|James Herron|Patti Willis|Rashid Mausi|Carla Benson|Keith Benson|John Ingram|Misty Love|Cherokee Pree|Delbert Nelson|Kizzy Jester|Dawn Blandford|Florence Ballard|Marcus Belgrave|Ruth Brown|Katie Chonacas|Fats Domino|Dwight D. Eisenhower|The Funk Brothers|Marvin Gaye|Berry Gordy|Lottie 'The Body' Graves|George Harrison|Billie Holiday|Mick Jagger|Louis Jordan|Ron Kischuk|John Lennon|Paul McCartney|Karen Minard|Larry Nozero|Elvis Presley|Smokey Robinson|Diana Ross|Ringo Starr|Sly Stone|Big Joe Turner|Jackie Wilson|Mary Wilson|Stevie Wonder|Dave Daniels|Jennifer Secord|Dean Teaster
title: Standing in the Shadows of Motown
